text:
Hello everyone!
I would like to know if it is possible to identify if when a deal is created with a company and that same company already has an open deal, is there any way to notify that that same company already participates in a deal?

Hey All, not sure if anyone can help us with this. We are trying get our the code in our serverless function more organized by splitting off some functions into other JS files.

File1 QaCheck.js
`const axios = require('axios');`
`var Quality_Check_Contracts = require('Quality_Check_Contracts');`
`exports.main = ({ accountId, body }, sendResponse) => {`

File 2 Quality_Check_Contracts.js

`module.exports = {`
  `contractQAHandler: function () {`
    `//run code`
  `}`
`};`

when we run the serverless function from the main fine it says 2156msRuntime.ImportModuleError: Error: Cannot find module 'Quality_Check_Contracts'

both files are located in our serverless.functions file

I'm kinda new to nodejs and I'm not 100% on this issue.
